title: Tuesday Post Show (03-15-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (03-15-22)
description:
Bobby starts by revealing how he feels like he popped a lung working out. He says that his wife thinks he is going too hard doing so. We also talk about Matthew McConaughey's hair regrowth secret. Amy gets her DraftKings setup and Bobby gives her advice on March Madness. Amy also reveals that she wants to go back to school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
